events.name: Singapore Science Festival: Visual SG: Beauty in Patterns
events.description:
South East Asia’s signature Visualisation Festival, Visual SG, presents a full on visual spectacle of data through the lens of artistic and creative expression. With a line-up of interactive displays, forums and workshops, a highlight includes unwrapping and exploring an Egyptian mummy using an interactive touch table.
 Entry: Admission fees to Science Centre Singapore apply
events.location: Science Centre Singapore, 15 Science Centre Road, Singapore 609081

events.name: Discussion and Open space for Emerging Big data and Analytics Technologies
events.description: Agenda : 7:00 PM : Networking and Discussion 7:30 PM : Discussion on Emerging OLTP Databases on top of Hadoop and its future 8:00 PM : Breakout session 9:00 PM : END and BYE BYE

events.name: talk.js + talk.css = Special Edition!
events.description: We're turning a timing clash into something different with a special edition merger between front-end JavaScript and CSS. Debugging CSS Panel Discussion What do you do when everything goes bad? We'll hear from several developers about what to do without losing too much hair. JavaScripty details over at Talk.JS We try to keep our timing tight so make sure you arrive close to the start time. Use the hash tag #SingaporeCSS whenever the urge comes. Even if you're not a speaker this time, and get a sudden flash of inspiration, we welcome lightning talks too. Just poke us before the event starts and we'll slot you in. Lastly, if you want to speak or help out with anything, please contact Hui Jing or Chris.
events.location: PayPal, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985, Singapore

events.name: Hackware v2.0

(2min) Digital clock kit - Rebeka and Peter Dunne
events.location: Simplifi3D, 20 Peck Seah St, Level 1 ,Singapore 079312, Singapore
